title: Activity
description: Top-level activity from which there can be multiple loot sources.

rotationStartDate.title: Rotation Start Date
rotationStartDate.description: If this activity has sources that rotate, the date at reset where the rotation starts.

rotationDuration.title: Rotation Duration (days)
rotationDuration.description: The days between each rotation change

isSingleSource.title: Is Single Source?
isSingleSource.description: If there's only one loot source for this activity.

lootSource.title: Loot Source
lootSource.description: An encounter, rotator instance, etc from which a group of items can drop.

isPreferredLootSource.title: Is Preferred Loot Source?
isPreferredLootSource.description: If this is the best source for these items due to drop rate/farmability

items.description: Bungie InventoryItem hash for the loot item
